_metadata.description: Maps negotiation responses to trigger words, with confidence and fallback handling.

response_types.label: Lowball Offer
response_types.guidance: Stay calm, re-anchor with market data before responding emotionally.

response_types.label: Delay / Stall
response_types.guidance: Acknowledge delay, then suggest a concrete date to resume.

response_types.label: Topic Shift
response_types.guidance: Redirect gently: acknowledge the shift, but bring back to core issue.

response_types.label: Personal Attack / Devaluing
response_types.guidance: De-escalate calmly, set boundaries, and pivot to shared goals.

response_types.label: Unknown Response
response_types.guidance: Default fallback: empathize and ask clarifying question.
